content.rendered:
Directed by R. Kannan

Written by Kona Venkat. Kabilan Vairamuthu

Star Lalit Aditya .Aysel Aghayeva .Tahir Alizada .Afsar Allahveriyev .Anandh .Anbumozhi .Jamila Gahramanova .Lika Gavrish .Veenitha Guptha .Kamran Hakimov .Humayun .Togrul Jafarov .Jaswanth .Krish Kanth .Lala .Madhan . Atharvaa Murali (Arun).Akash Kumar Muthu .Aadukalam Naren .Farah Nasirova . Omsaran (Hero friend couple). Anupama Parameswaran (Pallavi (as Anupama Parameshwaran)).Fatima Popova .Amitash Pradhan .Girish Pradhan .Rajeswari .Rama Ramasamy .Randilyan .Sinthura Sankar .Ozalim Suleymanova .Thejank .Vijayalakshmi .Vinaya .Elvin Yusilfli .Yuvraj

Language Tamil

Producers Emin Guliyev. Nariman Mammadov. Omsaran

Production Masala Pix
